long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pong Overlay allows you to play the classic game of pong any time while you're on chrome. Simply press the icon and a game of pong will appear. The background is transparent, which allows you to see and interact with your screen just like normal. In the game, you play against an AI. To control the paddle, simply move your mouse up and down. If the ball gets past a paddle, the other player gets a point. There is no end to the game, which makes for endless fun. Pressing the icon again will pause the game as well as take it away from your screen. Press the icon as many times to pause and start the game to your needs. Have fun!
